SQL.LOAD: SELECT cert_item_id, cert_id, item_number, risk_type_id, manufacturer_id, max_replacement_cost, serial_number, model, item_created_by, item_created_date, item_modified_by, item_modified_date, company_id, item_description, item_code, item_retail_price, item_replace_return_date, external_product_code, product_code, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, cert_item_hist_id FROM elp_cert_item_history WHERE cert_item_hist_id = :cert_item_hist_id
SQL.LOAD_HISTORY: select cih.cert_item_hist_id, cih.cert_item_id, cih.cert_id, cih.serial_number || '' as serial_number, cih.imei_number || '' as imei_number, cih.model || '' as model, cih.manufacturer_id, cih.created_date, m.description || '' as manufacturer, cih.sku_number || '' as sku_number, rt.description || '' as risk_type, cih.item_modified_date from elp_cert_item_history cih left Join elp_manufacturer m on m.manufacturer_id = cih.manufacturer_id left join elp_risk_type rt on rt.risk_type_id = cih.risk_type_id Inner Join (select cert_item_id, Min(created_date) as created_date from elp_cert_item_history where cert_id = :cert_id and cert_item_id = :cert_item_id and (serial_number is not null or model is not null or manufacturer_id is not null) group by cert_item_id ,Item_Number ,Risk_Type_Id ,Manufacturer_Id ,Max_Replacement_Cost ,Serial_Number ,Model ,Product_Code ,Item_Description ,Item_Code ,Item_Retail_Price ,Item_Replace_Return_Date ,External_Product_Code ,Mobile_Type ,First_Use_Date ,Last_Use_Date ,Sim_Card_Number ,Sku_Number ,Cert_Product_Code) T ON t.cert_item_id = cih.cert_item_id and t.created_date = cih.created_date order by cih.created_date desc
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_cert_item_history SET cert_item_id = :cert_item_id, cert_id = :cert_id, item_number = :item_number, risk_type_id = :risk_type_id, manufacturer_id = :manufacturer_id, max_replacement_cost = :max_replacement_cost, serial_number = :serial_number, model = :model, item_created_by = :item_created_by, item_created_date = :item_created_date, item_modified_by = :item_modified_by, item_modified_date = :item_modified_date, company_id = :company_id, item_description = :item_description, item_code = :item_code, item_retail_price = :item_retail_price, item_replace_return_date = :item_replace_return_date, external_product_code = :external_product_code, product_code = :product_code, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE cert_item_hist_id = :cert_item_hist_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_cert_item_history ( cert_item_id, cert_id, item_number, risk_type_id, manufacturer_id, max_replacement_cost, serial_number, model, item_created_by, item_created_date, item_modified_by, item_modified_date, company_id, item_description, item_code, item_retail_price, item_replace_return_date, external_product_code, product_code, created_by, cert_item_hist_id ) VALUES ( :cert_item_id, :cert_id, :item_number, :risk_type_id, :manufacturer_id, :max_replacement_cost, :serial_number, :model, :item_created_by, :item_created_date, :item_modified_by, :item_modified_date, :company_id, :item_description, :item_code, :item_retail_price, :item_replace_return_date, :external_product_code, :product_code, :created_by, :cert_item_hist_id )
